mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, password, nickname, age, phone_number, role, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{age}, #{phoneNumber}, #{role}, default, default)
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET email = #{email}, password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickName}, age = #{age}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, role = #{role}, updated_at = default WHERE user_idx = #{userIdx}
